full_text: Page 2027 Fwd: Washington Post reporter reaching out From [b(6); (b)(7)(C) To Lamine N'Diaye Date 2019/07/23 20:16 Subject: Fwd: Washington Post reporter reaching out Attachments: TEXT.htm Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone Original message From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Date: 7/23/19 6:32 PM(GMT-05:00) To [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Subject: Fwd: Washington Post reporter reaching out [b(6); (b)(7)(C) 07/23/2019 18:32 [b(6); (b)(7)(C) If you get any inquiries on this situation or inmate (see below), please decline to comment. Thats all we will say on this. [b(6); (b)(7)(C) please forward my e Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com Subject: Washington Post reporter reaching out [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com 07/23/2019 18:00 Hi, I'm told that MCC inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unconscious and unresponsive in his jail cell, and that there is currently an internal inquiry to determine 6330, can you please call? Thanks, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Washington Post Page 11227 DOJ-OGR-00025913

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com Subject: Washington Post reporter reaching out [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com 07/23/2019 18:00 Hi, I'm told that MCC inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unconscious and unresponsive in his jail cell, and that there is currently an internal inquiry to determine 6330, can you please call? Thanks, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Washington Post

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]. The email chain discusses an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein in his jail cell at MCC.
